remarks: Value of the set of morphisms in the binary product of categories. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
xpcco2.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
xpcco2.x $e |- X = ( Base ` C ) $.
xpcco2.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` D ) $.
xpcco2.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
xpcco2.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
xpcco2.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. X ) $.
xpcco2.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Y ) $.
xpcco2.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. X ) $.
xpcco2.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. Y ) $.
xpchom2.k $e |- K = ( Hom ` T ) $.
xpchom2 $p |- ( ph -> ( <. M , N >. K <. P , Q >. ) = ( ( M H P ) X. ( N J Q ) ) ) $.
